app.name: FesTool
app.long_description: This tool allows you to play custom Splatfests in Splatoon. For credits, press X at the selection menu. For more information on the events and setup, see the thread here: https://gbatemp.net/threads/release-festool-play-custom-splatfests-in-splatoon.456696/ BE WARY OF BANS and read the thread carefully before using! You can only play Splatfest Battles with FesTool when a Splatfest is happening.
